subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: CHICAGO, July 15 — Pedro Martínez received intravenous fluids at a local hospital Friday after complaining of a fever, apparently the result of food poisoning. Martínez also underwent testing, including a CT scan of his abdomen, to confirm that his stomach ailment was not caused by appendicitis, General Manager Omar Minaya said.
